title: Add Mercurial Scimitar as an item?
body: {{item:3139}} would answer the many, many complaints about glacial, and could easily replace the rarely used ({{item:1043}} + {{item:1057}} ).  Most other insanely powerful comps have answers (level 6 sorc = ({{item:1057}} + {{item:1057}}), yordles = {{item:3094}} , assassins = {{item:3046}} ), but nothing reduces or negates glacial CC.   {{item:3139}} is the perfect answer.  It could have some percentage chance to ignore freezes and maybe stuns (leona is it right now, I think).  I'm not sure how it would interact with knockups, but I like the idea of them still hitting someone with {{item:3139}} .

replies.body: Or rather than a percentage have it insta negate the first stun per round...

the counter to glacial is spreading out and positioning your carries away from the aoe

although i like the idea i pretty much hate the pyke/ashe perma stuns
